Help and support
Gingerbread	(www.gingerbread.org.uk)
Gingerbread is a self-help organisation 
for one-parent families that has a 
network of local groups which can 
offer	you	information	and	advice.	They	
will be able to put you in touch with 
other mothers in a similar
